greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions p of n such that (number of even numbers in p) >= (number of odd numbers in p).
comment: Each number in p is counted once, regardless of its multiplicity.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k<=0} A242618(n,k). - _Alois P. Heinz_, May 19 2014
mathematica: z = 30; f[n_] := f[n] = IntegerPartitions[n]; s0[p_] := Count[Mod[DeleteDuplicates[p], 2],   0];
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Apr 27 2014
